Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The total project cost must not exceed the allocated budget

Name: team_size_upper_limit
Description: A team must not have more than 9 members to ensure agility

Name: sprint_end_date_is_fixed
Description: A sprint must strictly adhere to its planned end date (timeboxing)

Name: worker_availability_limit
Description: A worker's assigned work must not exceed their defined availability

Name: critical_task_skill_requirement
Description: A critical task requires a worker with a minimum skill level

Name: feature_priority_is_set
Description: Every feature in the backlog must have an assigned priority greater than 0

Name: story_points_are_positive
Description: Every user story must have an estimated story point value greater than 0

Name: prefer_certified_skills
Description: Prefer workers with certified skills for completing tasks

Name: assigned_team_is_active
Description: A team assigned to a project must have an 'active' status

Name: task_effort_is_estimated
Description: The effort for every task must be estimated (value > 0)

Name: sprint_must_have_goal
Description: Every sprint must have a clearly defined sprint goal

Name: team_size_lower_limit
Description: A team must have at least 3 members to be effective

Name: avoid_high_severity_blockers
Description: Avoid having blockers with a high or critical severity status

Name: epic_status_is_valid
Description: The status of an epic must be one of the predefined values (e.g., not null)
